text: Shawn Robert Ashmore (born October 7, 1979) is a Canadian movie and television actor. He is best known for his roles as Jake Berenson in the television series Animorphs, Agent Mike Weston in the television drama series The Following, Bobby Drake / Iceman in the X-Men movie series, and Wesley in the tv series The Rookie.
